title: Every Piece in This Exhibition Is a Fake
excerpt: A new show at London's Courtauld Gallery will explore the value of counterfeit art

title: The Case of the Disputed Lucian Freud
excerpt: A collector thought he had bought a painting by the celebrated British artist. How far would he go to prove it?

title: F is for Fake
excerpt: How a dozen possibly fraudulent and forged Indigenous artworks left Texas and ended up on museum walls in Wyoming.

title: How to Spot a Perfect Fake: The World’s Top Art Forgery Detective
excerpt: Forgeries have become so good – and so costly – that Sotheby’s has brought in its own in-house fraud-busting expert.
